SELECT i.item_id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, s.quantity AS quantity, s.favorite_yn AS favoriteYn, im.path AS imageUrl, sa.safe_quantity AS safeQuantity, GREATEST(i.updated_at, s.updated_at) AS lastUpdatedAt FROM item i JOIN stock s ON s.item_id = i.item_id AND s.store_id = i.store_id LEFT JOIN safe sa ON sa.stock_id = s.stock_id LEFT JOIN image im ON im.image_id = i.image_id AND im.is_active = b'1' WHERE i.store_id = #{storeId} AND i.item_id = #{itemId} AND i.del_yn = b'0'
